description: Product care and improvement of pharmaceutical software for one of the largest international MedTech companies.
highlights: My first experience on the MedTech sector, it had been my dream to work on a project like this for a long time.
I'm able to participate in some ways on the design of new features, conduct code reviews and learn software architecture hand on hand.
I also sometimes conduct demos for the product owners. We follow the Agile methodologies as well as SCRUM.

description: Product care and migration of one of the leading ERPs specialized for the bakery sector in Spain.
highlights: My first experience programming on a bigger project.
Participated actively in the design and improvement of the product, which let me learn a lot about analysing client needs.

description: My first job as a junior developer. Created small PoCs to cover needs the company wanted to address, such as:
highlights: A digital employee clock-in system, developed in WPF for a touch-screen and included RFID card reading.
A CLI application that read from a spanish API that serves information about electricity prices through the day, which then feeded an internal system.
